      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public UserDto updateUser(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateUserDto updateUserDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - of the User that will be updated
      updateUserDto - input DTO model of the User with applied changes
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      UserDto model of the updated User

    • deleteUserById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public UserDto deleteUserById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - of the User that will be deleted
      Returns:
      UserDto model of the User that was deleted
